PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: 14 It is worth noting that the maxima absorption values of PCDSeBT in the film are slightly broadened without any obvious red - shift when compared to the solution.

Let's think step by step.

1. maxima absorption values of PCDSeBT: These are the peak values of the absorption spectrum for PCDSeBT in the film.
2. in the film: This refers to the material or substance in which PCDSeBT is present in this context.
3. slightly broadened: This describes the change in the width of the absorption peaks in the film compared to the solution.
4. without any obvious red - shift: This indicates that there is no noticeable change in the wavelength of the absorption peaks towards longer wavelengths (red shift) in the film compared to the solution.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

1. maxima absorption values of PCDSeBT: These are the peak values of the absorption spectrum for PCDSeBT.
2. slightly broadened: This describes the change in the width of the absorption peaks.
3. without any obvious red - shift: This indicates whether there is a noticeable change in the wavelength of the absorption peaks towards longer wavelengths (red shift).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
